,,, MCU;STMicroelectronics;STM32F303;;1; ,,, |flags=Bluetooth 4.0, LCD Display, Camera 13MP, IR LED, Microphone, Speaker, Battery |stock_boot= |stock_os=Android;6.0;Marshmallow; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=AC:22:0B |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Intelligent Robot}} :[https://zenbo.asus.com/product/overview/ Product page] ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8550 @2.5GHz Quad Core (Cherry Trail) *Flash: 32GB / 128GB Storage, RAM: 4GB (DDR3) Memory *Connectivity: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0; USB 3.0 (Type A) port *Camera: 3D Camera (13MP); [[Intel]] ''RealSense'' R200 *Operating System: Android 6.0 (''Marshmallow'') *Speaker: 1x 15W; Microphone: 4x Digital Microphones *Display: 10.1" WXGA LCD, 10x points multi-touch display *Sensors: IR Drop; Sonar: Auto Recharge, Touch; LED Wheels *Power Supply: DC 19V/2.37A; Battery: Li-Ion 14.4V/8Ah 95W *Dimensions: 370 x 370 x 620 mm; Weight: 10kg ===Rewiews=== *[https://theleaker.com/asus-zenbo-personal-assistant-robot/ ''ASUS Zenbo Robot'' on '''TheLeaker'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2017/07/asus-zenbo-robot-hits-fcc-complete-teardown-photos.html ''ASUS Zenbo Robot'' on '''Liliputing'''] ===See also=== *[[ASUS AiCam]] - ''Smart Cloud NightView Camera'' • [https://www.unifore.net/ip-video-surveillance/asus-aicam-alternative-d1000-smart-wifi-ip-camera.html PR] *[[ASUS AiCam 2]] - ''Smart Cloud NightView Camera'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/AiCam-2/ PPage] *[[ASUS HG100]] - ''Smart Home Gateway'' • [http://armdevices.net/2016/02/18/asus-hg100-rk3066-smart-home-gateway-via-zigbeewifi-bluetooth/ PR] • [https://www.asus.com/sg/Internet-of-Things/ASUS-SmartHome-Gateway-HG100/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RK903 MSQ-RK903] (2015-04-02) • [https://mysmahome.com/news/4305/asus-debuts-smart-home-series-using-zigbee-2/ PR] • [https://mysmahome.com/product/6285/product-introduction-asus-smart-home-gateway-hg100/ PR] *[[ASUS Zenbo]] - ''Home Robot'' • [http://hexus.net/tech/items/laptop/106402-asus-showcases-new-consumer-lifestyle-products-computex-2017/ Computex 2017 PR] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-ZENBO MSQ-ZENBO] (2017-07-27) *[[ASUS Zenbo Junior]] - ''Home Robot'' • [https://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/m/tech-news-asus-zenbo-junior-smaller-cuter-companion-robot-businesses 2018 PR] :FCC ID: MSQ-ZENBO-K (2019-07-31) ==Images== __NOTOC__
